text: uyala thibba parippuwa ekka bath bedaganda yanakota karola kallak badala denakan hitahan kiyuwahama ...ba badaginiyi kiyala bath hadi dekak bedagana ...lipe uda thibba parippuwen tikak dagana ...oya biththi kandiya udata giya ....man hoda hoda hitiya uuru mas eka paththakin thiyala thondayo dennek aran , thachchuwa lipe thiyala ...lunu miris ...athagala badagana issarahata enakota sudu saramayi sart ekayi gahagana ..ara kalakanniya ...kollage bath eka kanawa ...‘‘

ada drawida bendumwadin uthuru nagenahira depalathe padinchi sinhalayan siya gam bim walin palawa harina athara ( wawuniyawa kokeliya gammanaye sinhalayan panna damayi – uthuren pitawennayi hitapu maha kotiyekugen tharjana ), owunge aagamika sthana pawa kada binda damamin (iwanjalika eelam kalliyak, kilinochchiye buddha prathimawak winasha karayi), nuduredima gena ena nawa wyawasthawa magin labena fedaral nohoth wenama rajyaye bhumiya owunge aagam nowana wenath aagamika puda bim walin thora bhumiyak karamin siti.

k gena waidya widyalayakata ya nohaki sisun sitiddi adhyapana pahasukam athin dushkara yayi salakanu labana disthrikkayaka sisun adu prathipala gena waidya widyalayakata athulath weyi.meya asadharanayak noweda?ese nam ema sisunta kala haki ekama piliyama wanne nawatha u.pe. kirima ho wenath pathamalawak sadaha athulath wima ho widesha rataka wi.wi.ka waidya widyawa hadarima pamani.mewani sisun sulutharayakata ho yam pamanaka awasthawak pu.wi.wi. pihituwimen nolabeda?emenama landan u.pe. kala sisunta ra.wi.wi. walata athulath wiya nohaki nisa owunta merata sita usas adhyapanaya labime hakiyawak natha.ese nam owuntada athi ekama piliyama pu.wi.wi. noweda?wiwrutha wi.wi. ha nithi widyalaya mudal gewa adhyapanaya labiya yuthu aayathana we.wiwrutha wishwa widyalayata sa.pe. samath nowi wuwada athulak wiya haka.pu.wi.wi. pihituwimata wiruddha wannan mema aayathana dekata wiruddha nowanne ayi?owun kiyana aakarayata meyinda diya yuththe nomile adhyapanaya noweda?pudgalika anshaya sama witama kriya karanne laba labime apekshaweni.ema nisa pu.wi.wi. pihitu wuwahoth eewaye adhyapanaya labimata wishala mudal pramanayak gewiya yuthu bawa sabawakya.bahuthara kotasakata asadharanayak wana bawa da sabawakya.namuth samajawadi ratawal wana chinaya, wenisiyulawa, kiyubawa wani ratawal walada pu.wi.wi. thibe.ese nam apa ratehi pu.wi.wi. arambaimata wiruddha wanne apa owuntath wada samajawadi wiya yuthu nisada?pu.wi.wi. patan gatha hoth ra.wi.wi. walata eewa samaga tharaga kala nohaki nisa wasi yana bawa thawath samaharunge mathayaki.ese nam kala hakke ra.wi.wi. walatada wenath aadayam marga sada ganimayi.mudal gewa ra.wi.wi. kin adhyapanaya labimata kamathi kotasakata ema awasthawa salasa dimen yam aadayamak laba gatha haka.bahira upadhi ek wisadumaki.pu.wi.wi. aarambha kala hoth eewayehi sewaya kirimata ra.wi.wi. wala aacharyayawarun ya haki yayi kiyana nisa ra.wi.wi. wasi yana bawa thawath pirisak kiyayi.namuth mema aacharyayawarunda adhyapanaya laba aththe ra.wi.wi. walama nisa owuntath pu.wi.wi. walata wiruddha wannangema chinthanaya pihita thibiya yuthuya.ekko wishwa widyalayen pita wana wita ema adahas nathi wi gos atha.wadi padiyak denne nam owun pu.wi.wi.ka sewaya kirimata akamathi nowe.danda pashchath upadhi sadaha widesha gatha wana ra.wi.wi. wala aacharyayawarun boho wita ema ratawalama nawathi wadi padiyakata sewaya karayi.meyata wisaduma ra.wi.wi. wala aacharyayawarunge padi wadi kirima misa pu.wi.wi. wiwrutha kirimata wiruddha wima nowe.emenma kalak pu.wi.wi. walata wiruddhawa hadak nagu aacharyaya, mahacharyaya warunma dan pu.wi.wi. arambaimata wiruddha nowanne owunge adahas wenas wi athi nisa noweda?lowa thibena sama palamu pele wi.wi. kama adhyapanaya labimata nam eewata mudal gewiya yuthuwe.namuth ema ratawala mudal nomathi janathawa eewata wiruddhawa wasa damiya yuthu yayi kiya ho nidahas adhyapanaya diya yuthu yayi kiyanneda?ape ratehi kisidu wi.wi.k aasiyawehi hodama wi.wi. 100 athara ho nomatha.ese nam kala yuththe pu.wi.wi. k ho merata aarambha kirimata idadi eya hodama wi.wi. 100 atharata ho gena eema noweda?pu.wi.wi aarambha kala hoth eewayehi adhyapanaya labimata widesha ratawala sisunda meratata pamine.emagin apa ratata widesha winimayada upaya gatha haka.malesiyawa, wiyatnamaya wani ratawala wenath ratawal wala athi wishwa widyalawala shakha aarambha kara thibe.mewayehi lankiya sisunda wishala pramanayak adhyapanaya labayi.mewani kramayak magin ho adhyapanaya labime warama apa ratehi natha.mewani aayathana kihipayak lankawehi athath eewayin bohomayaka adhyapanaya labiya haki wanne simitha pathamala kipayak sadaha pamani.dan lankawehi athi thathwaya anuwa aanduwa hata adhyapanaya wenuwen waya kala haki mudala sima wemin pawathi.eyata kala haki ekama piliyama wanne pudgalika anshaya sadahada awasthawak laba dima pamani.namuth ema awasthawa himi wiya yuththe "jawa kadayakata" ho mara deshapalagnyayanta aacharyaya upadhi pirinamana wi.wi. kata nowiya yuthuya.

ema tharagawala di shri lankawata kapi penena dakshatha dakwimata nohaki wiya.tebal tenis lokada padakkamtebal tenis eekala tharagaye lokada padakkama thariÁdra darshani da pirimi eekala tharagaye lokada padakkama chalitha ranjanada eeye himikara gathha.mewara tharagawaliye di shri lankawa malala krida tharagawala di ran padakkam 8k, ridi padakkam 8k ha lokada padakkam 6k dina gaththe ya.mitar 100 shehan ambaepitiya, mitar 1500 chaminda wijekon, mitar 200 ha mitar 400 chandrika subhashini, mitar 100 o 4 kantha ha pirimi, dura panima en. si. di. priyadarshani, ha usa panima priyangika madhumanthi ran sammanayata pathra wuha. 2006 wasare di shri lankawa malala kridawen ran padakkam 14k dina gaththeya.pihinum isawwalin mewara ran padakkam 3k himi wu athara mineka karunarathna ran padakkam 2k ha mitar 100 pasupasa aara nawa sag warthawak bihikala heshan unambuwa ran padakkamak dina gathha. 2006 di shri lankawata pihinum isawwalin ran padakkam 5k himiwiya.bara isilime tharagawala di kamal bandara ha chinthana githal widanage ran padakkam 2k himikara dunneya. 2006 di me isawwen ranpadakkamak pamanak himiwiya.shri lankawata mewara papadi, tayikondo, karate tharagawalin ran padakkama bagin himiwiya. 2006 di papadi ran 5k, tayikondo ran 2k ha karate ran 4k himiwa thibuni.
